author: A_Brickset_user
title: Green, green & green
review: A lot of cool sets were released in 1996 and this was one of them. It includes trees, plants, fences and a palm. The palm is shorter and less flexible than the one from 1993. Anyway I think the flags are useless and could be replaced with useful trees.

author: asianlego
title: Say yes to green!
review: This is a great expansion set in our town and without it your town layouts are probably a large industrial wasteland with little or no greenery in it. It contains a few white fence pieces, lots of flowers and vines, a few shrubs, a couple of pine trees, a coconut tree, a couple of flags and also a nice rainbow parrot. I'd say you get this if you want your town to be a more asthetically pleasant place to live in.
